ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.link

Class LinkController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.link.LinkController

  • public class LinkController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for handling link interactions.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier

      void addLinkListener(LinkListener listener)
      Adds a link listener.
      static void destroyLink(Link link, StyleEditorTree tree)
      Destroys the link by enumerating over the entire tree and setting all link references that match the passed link to NULL.

      Fires the link event to all link listeners.

      Determines whether or not the selection is linkable.
      boolean isLinkableEvent(java.lang.Class<?> event) 
      static void removeLink(StyleEditorNode node, StyleEditorTree tree)
      Attempts to remove the link from the passed node and updates the other nodes in the tree if the criteria for maintaining the link is not met.
      void removeLinkListener(LinkListener listener)
      Removes the link listener, if possible.

      • destroyLink

        public static void destroyLink(Link link,
               StyleEditorTree tree)
        Destroys the link by enumerating over the entire tree and setting all link references that match the passed link to NULL.
        Parameters:
        link - The link to destroy.
        tree - The tree whose nodes will be iterated.

      • isLinkable

        public static boolean isLinkable(javax.swing.tree.TreePath[] treePaths)
        Determines whether or not the selection is linkable. Criteria: Only 1 LegendItemNode At least 1 SetNode
        Parameters:
        treePaths -
        Returns:
        Whether or the nodes selection in the paths are linkable.

      • removeLink

        public static void removeLink(StyleEditorNode node,
              StyleEditorTree tree)
        Attempts to remove the link from the passed node and updates the other nodes in the tree if the criteria for maintaining the link is not met.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to attempt to remove the link from.
        tree - The tree to correct if the criteria is not longer met.
